Springdale.McCleod House: The McCleod House is a historic house on South Mills Lane in Springdale, Arkansas. It is a 1-1/2 story wood frame I-house, with a projecting single-story porch on the front, and a leanto section on the back, giving the house a saltbox shape. A gable at the center of the front facade contains a door giving access to the upper level of the porch.
